entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
